## DateInterval class

Filters is a key component when communicating with a backend. The DateInterval filter extends the Between filter and should be used instead of constructions like trunc(col) = trunc(date) that in most cases cannot use an index on the column.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class DateInterval extends Between 
```
**Extends:** [Between](./forms42core.between.md)
